name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quizonic - Join Quiz Games In 2 Clicks

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quizonic is a FREE Chrome browser extension that allows you to join quiz games in 2 clicks!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quizonic supports the world's most popular quiz games, like RevisionSuccess, Kahoot, Blooket, Quizizz and Gimkit. Users can directly enter the game PIN into the extension, and it will automatically enter the user into the game.

Instructions:
1. Select the quiz website
2. Enter the game PIN

You will be taken to the quiz website, and automatically entered into the game with the game PIN.

Disclaimer:
Quizonic is developed by RevisionSuccess, and is not affiliated with Kahoot, Blooket, Quizizz, Gimkit, or any other services mentioned. All trademarks, logos, and brand names are the property of their respective owners.
